item.title: 'Tiger Balm' | Tee Exhibition | MMMRecords, Itaewon, Seoul, S.Korea
item.description: ‘Tiger Balm’ tee, part of a t-shirt exhibition at @mmmrecords Itaewon, Seoul. Huge thanks to @dekal for making all the tees and setting up the exhibition! absolute legend! The second part of the exhibition was intended to take place at @yesultong but unfortunately had to be cancelled due to covid restrictions, hopefully we can set something else up soon to take it’s place in the near future!

item.title: 'I K A R O A' | B&W & ULTRAVIOLET
item.description: I K A R O A - Framed, two colour silkscreen print. Taking its name from the Maori word for ‘the long fish that gave birth to all the stars in the Milky Way’ depicts a carp, bringing together Japanese and Maori culture within a retro framework.silkscreen print.

item.title: 'I K A R O A' | Illustration & Colour Variations
item.description: I K A R O A - Framed, two colour silkscreen print. Taking its name from the Maori word for ‘the long fish that gave birth to all the stars in the Milky Way’ depicts a carp, bringing together Japanese and Maori culture within a retro framework. silkscreen print.

item.title: 'Vishnu' | Illustration
item.description: Vishnu is the Preserver and guardian of men (Narayana), he protects the order of things (dharma) and, when necessary, he appears on earth in various incarnations or avatars to fight demons and fierce creatures and so maintain cosmic harmony.

item.title: 'House of Vans' | Event 2014 | Seoul, S.Korea
item.description: Illustration for ‘House Of Vans’ Event 2014. Thanks for the sweet shoes!
